settings.name: game
settings.description: Determines which game you'll be playing.

settings.name: accessibility
settings.description: How much the game expects you to do checks and get items.

values.locations: All locations – You can go everywhere, and so, all checks are eventually accessible
values.items: All items – All progression items are accessible, but all locations won't be
values.none: Beatable – The only guarantee is that you'll have the bare necessity to beat the game

settings.name: progression_balancing
settings.description: The more players have this off, the more likely BK/DQ mode is to happen for people who have this off even if everyone's playing at an even tick.
